metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibSass 3.5-stable, there is an illegal address access at Sass::Parser::parse_css_variable_value_token that will lead to a DoS attack.

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> as of 2019-10-04, It's still an open issue

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
